span.p:
体温正常24h
进食良好
生命体征稳定

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: white !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

color: white !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
经验性广谱抗生素
+支持治疗

div.style: color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
β-内酰胺类+大环内酯类
或呼吸喹诺酮

div.style: color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
静脉抗生素治疗
阿莫西林克拉维酸+大环内酯
或头孢曲松+多西环素

div.style: color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
口服抗生素
阿莫西林+多西环素
或呼吸喹诺酮

div.style: color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
降阶梯治疗
完成5-7天疗程

div.style: color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
影像学复查
引流等干预
